metadata.name: Stopwatch
metadata.author: Mihael
metadata.desc: Stopwatch contains to measure time taken

component.source:
<karajan> <include file="java.xml"/>
<element name="stopwatch:initialize" arguments="count"> <global name="_stopwatch"> <java:new classname="org.globus.cog.util.timer.StopWatch" types="int"> <argument value="{count}"/> </java:new> </global> </element>
<element name="stopwatch:setName" arguments="index, name"> <java:invokeMethod object="{_stopwatch}" method="set" types="int, java.lang.String"> <argument value="{index}"/> <argument value="{name}"/> </java:invokeMethod> </element>
<element name="stopwatch:start" arguments="index"> <java:invokeMethod object="{_stopwatch}" method="start" types="int"> <argument value="{index}"/> </java:invokeMethod> </element>
<element name="stopwatch:pause" arguments="index"> <java:invokeMethod object="{_stopwatch}" method="pause" types="int"> <argument value="{index}"/> </java:invokeMethod> </element>
<element name="stopwatch:resume" arguments="index"> <java:invokeMethod object="{_stopwatch}" method="resume" types="int"> <argument value="{index}"/> </java:invokeMethod> </element>
<element name="stopwatch:print" arguments="index"> <java:invokeMethod object="{_stopwatch}" method="printTimer" types="int"> <argument value="{index}"/> </java:invokeMethod> </element>
</karajan>
